verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> who shall <S%H1481>dwell<s%> in your <S%H168>sanctuary?<s%> Who shall <S%H7931>live<s%> on your <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>hill?<s%>
He who <S%H1980>walks<s%> <S%H8549>blamelessly<s%> <S%H6466>does<s%> what is <S%H6664>right,<s%> and <S%H1696>speaks<s%> <S%H571>truth<s%> in his <S%H3824>heart;<s%>

He who <S%H7270>doesn't<s%> slander with his <S%H3956>tongue,<s%> nor <S%H6213>does<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> to his <S%H7453>friend,<s%> nor <S%H5375>casts<s%> <S%H2781>slurs<s%> against his fellow <S%H7138>man;<s%>

In whose <S%H5869>eyes<s%> a vile <S%H3988>man<s%> is <S%H959>despised,<s%> but who <S%H3513>honors<s%> those who <S%H3373>fear<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> he who keeps an <S%H7650>oath<s%> even when it <S%H7489>hurts,<s%> and <S%H4171>doesn't<s%> change;

he who <S%H5414>doesn't<s%> lend out his <S%H3701>money<s%> for <S%H5392>usury,<s%> nor <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H7810>bribe<s%> against the <S%H5355>innocent.<s%> He who <S%H6213>does<s%> these things shall <S%H5769>never<s%> be <S%H4131>shaken.<s%>
